department.ch: 工業管理研究所碩士班

goal.ch:
"This course is to prepare students for being able to understand the procedure of planning and scheduling in a company. Use SAP ECC 6.0 for the lab course. The contents include the following:
 Master Data
- Material Master Data
- Bill of Material (BOM) 
- Work Center
- Routings
 Planning and Execution with Final Assembly
- Sales and Operations Planning 
- Planning Strategies
- Demand Management
- MRP
- Consumption and Availability Check
- Production Order"
goal.en:
"This course is to prepare students for being able to understand the procedure of planning and scheduling in a company. Use SAP ECC 6.0 for the lab course. The contents include the following:
 Master Data
- Material Master Data
- Bill of Material (BOM) 
- Work Center
- Routings
 Planning and Execution with Final Assembly
- Sales and Operations Planning 
- Planning Strategies
- Demand Management
- MRP
- Consumption and Availability Check
- Production Order"
